properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
40 FOOT S/V AVENIR, WHITE HULL, SIX PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT DUE TO LOSS OF RUDDER IN 35-12.6N 067-55.7W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK,
PHONE: 757 398 6390, FAX: 757 398 6392,
E-MAIL: D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
